trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper og metoder for å gi konsekvent utseendet til alle root-utviklere på en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En forekomst av en sekvensiell arbeidsflyt roten designer klassen opprettes når en arbeidsflyt som er opprettet i en arbeidsflyt designer, og den representerer utformingsoverflaten brukere kan legge til og redigere aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: En arbeidsflyt roten designer har ikke en overordnet utformer med mindre det er underordnede for et <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>aktiviteten.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: All workflow root designers must derive from SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.
trans-unit.target: Alle arbeidsflyten roten utviklere må være utledet fra SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> kan angis som overordnet aktiviteten tilknyttet designer.

trans-unit.source: Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Root utviklere kan ikke ha en overordnet aktivitet utformer utformingsoverflaten en arbeidsflyt.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, CanBeParentedTo returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en arvede klasse CanBeParentedTo returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> å se.

trans-unit.source: to allow the activity associated with parentActivityDesigner to be the parent of the activity associated with the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: tillate aktiviteten tilknyttet parentActivityDesigner skal overordnede aktiviteten tilknyttet den ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om designer kan utvides og skjules.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, CanExpandCollapse is always set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en deriving klasse CanExpandCollapse alltid settes til `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> kan være utvidet og skjult; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter bunnteksten tilknyttet root-designeren.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Footer appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i bunnteksten vises nederst i designer roten på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.
trans-unit.target: Kan vise ikoner og tekst i bunnteksten, inkludert ikonene som endrer designer visningen når en bruker velger én av dem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the footer associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> som representerer bunnteksten knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en skrivebeskyttet samlingen av punkt som representerer indre tilkoblingen av designer.

trans-unit.source: A designer can have connectors within it.
trans-unit.target: En designer kan ha koblinger i den.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> on which to gather the collection of connection points.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> å samle inn samlingen av punkt som tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> objects used for a connectable designer.
trans-unit.target: En samling som inneholder den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> objekter som brukes for en tilkobling designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av symboler som vises på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> som inneholder tegn som vises på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the header associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter overskriften tilknyttet root-designeren.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Header appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet av vises øverst i designer roten på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ikoner og tekst kan vises i hodet, inkludert tekst som angir designer visningen som vises på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the header associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> som representerer overskriften knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter bildet som er forbundet med designer.

trans-unit.source: Image property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: Bildeegenskapen er satt til den <xref:System.Drawing.Image>skal vises.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette under utformingen eller på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, Image returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en avledet klasse, Image, returnerer en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> å knytte til designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for de omsluttende grensene for bildet som er forbundet med designer i logiske koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageRectangle to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av ImageRectangle til å hente koordinatene for rektangel som omgir bildet som er forbundet med designer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke disse koordinatene for tegning koblinger og oppå grafikk.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that encloses the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> displayed for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som omslutter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> vises for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the sequential workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> som ble forespurt sekvensiell arbeidsflyt roten designer skal kunne initialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> som ble forespurt arbeidsflyten roten designer skal kunne initialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter minimumsstørrelsen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: MinimumSize represents the smallest size to which a user can resize the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: MinimumSize representerer den minste størrelsen som en bruker kan endre størrelse på <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the minimum size of the sequential workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den minste størrelsen på sekvensiell arbeidsflyt designer.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir størrelsen på visuelle indikatorer utviklere innenfor den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder argumentene oppsettet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the visual cues on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på visuelle indikatorer på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws any headers and footers associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Trekker en topp- og bunntekster som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint tegner noen teksten som skal inkluderes i topp- og bunntekster med riktig Temainnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: Den tegner også noen bilder skal tas med i topp- og bunntekster.

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnPaint in a derived class, be sure to call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** når du overstyrer OnPaint i en avledet klasse, må du kalle den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>-metoden til basisklassen slik som er registrert representanter motta hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: einneholder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer whether smart tags are to be shown or hidden on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Varsler designer om smart koder som skal vises eller skjules på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When called, OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged invalidates the text rectangle associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged ugyldiggjøres teksten rektangelet tilknyttet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** når du overstyrer OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged i en avledet klasse, må du kalle basisklassen <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>metoden slik som er registrert representanter motta hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display smart tags on the designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å vise smart koder på utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the root designer displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om root-designer viser smart koder.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), ShowSmartTag returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>ikke settes til en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) og tilhørende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A>egenskapen er ikke en tom streng eller satt til en nullreferanse (`Nothing`), ShowSmartTag returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> viser smart koder; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle on the designer surface in which to display a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet på utformingsoverflaten som skal vises en smart kode.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> at the location specified by SmartTagRectangle.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A>til å vise en smart kode over tilgjengelige <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A>på plasseringen angitt av SmartTagRectangle.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds in which to display the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer grensene for visning koden for smartkortet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter beskrivelsen som er forbundet med designer.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, Text returns <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en arvede klasse returnerer teksten <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder en beskrivelse som er forbundet med designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på tittelen for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Et område for roten designer tittelen inneholder vanligvis overskriften og et ikon som er forbundet med designer.

trans-unit.source: TitleHeight calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TitleHeight beregner heltallet som returneres ved henting av verdien for base implementeringen og legge til høyde heltall som er definert for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the height of the title area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer høyden på tittelen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.
